column4: Update on the David Sidoo case. Not-guilty plea entered in court in Boston today to mail fraud and money laundering charges. Judge said prosecutors shall provide automatic discovery by May 30. #bcpoli #OperationVarsityBlues

column4: RT @theBreakerNews Developing: Vancouver's David Sidoo to be arraigned on mail fraud and money laundering charges Monday in federal court in Boston, related to #OperationVarsityBlues scam. Sidoo is accused of paying $400K to have Mark Riddell write exams for his sons. #bcpoli
